info.name: Netvibes (Ginger) - Calibri, Segoe UI fonts
info.description:
Basically takes the two coolest fonts from Vista and displays them in your Netvibes (if you have them installed on your computer). If not, check out this post on how to easily install them on your Windows system.

http://lifehacker.com/365828/www.oooninja.com/2008/01/calibri-linux-vista-fonts-download.html
